70 Foto Kedekatan Hubungan RI - AS Dipamerkan
05 Nov 2019, 16:53 by Retno M



70 Foto Kedekatan Hubungan RI - AS Dipamerkan



70 Foto Kedekatan Hubungan RI - AS Dipamerkan



70 Foto Kedekatan Hubungan RI - AS Dipamerkan


 KBRN, Jakarta : Masih dalam rangkaian perayaan hubungan diplomatik antara Indonesia dan Amerika Serikat yang ke-70 pada tahun 2019, kali ini diselenggarakan pameran foto menggambarkan kedekatan hubungan kedua negara di berbagai sektor.Yang menjadi unik dari pameran foto yang diselenggarakan pada 5 - 10 November itu di Perpustakaan Nasional, adalah jumlah karya foto yang dipamerkan sama seperti usia hubungan diplomatik kedua negara tahun 2019 yaitu sebanyak 70 buah. Selain, 70 karya foto tersebut merupakan hasil bidikan kamera para pewarta LKBN Antara dan Indonesia Press Photo Service (IPPHOS), kedutaan besar Amerika Serikat dan Perpustakaan Nasional dari kurun waktu 1947 hingga saat ini. Duta Besar Amerika Serikat untuk Indonesia, Joseph R. Donovan mengatakan, pihaknya mengharapkan melalui pameran foto dapat tersampaikan dengan apik hubungan antara Indonesia dan Amerika Serikat, yang terjalin di berbagai segi kehidupan."Saya harap dari pameran ini menunjukkan hubungan antara Indonesia dan Amerika Serikat yang multifaset, yang bertahan lama dan berkelanjutan dan saya harap hal-hal itu yang bisa disampaikan dari pameran ini," ujar Donovan ketika ditemui di sela-sela pameran, Selasa (5/11/2019).Secara khusus Donovan menyampaikan, bahwa foto wakil presiden Amerika Serikat, Hubert Humphrey yang berkunjung ke Demak tahun 1967 menjadi favoritnya. "Hmmm, foto wapres Humphrey mungkin," tambahnya.Pasalnya menurut Donovan, pada foto itu wapres Humphrey terlihat berusaha keras menggali tanah dengan menggunakan cangkul. "Jadi favorit saya adalah foto wapres Hubert Humphrey ketika bekerja keras menggunakan cangkul," imbuh Donovan.Kala itu Humphrey berkunjung ke Demak dan bertemu dengan para pekerja Proyek Irigasi Semarang-Demak-Kudus, yang merupakan program "Food for Peace" dan didukung penuh oleh pemerintah Amerika Serikat. Foto tersebut merupakan koleksi Badan Administrasi Arsip dan Rekor Amerika Serikat.Menurut Editor LKBN Antara, Ade Marboen, foto kunjungan sejumlah anggota Komisi Tiga Negara (KTN) pada Februari 1949, ke tempat pengasingan para pejabat RI di Bangka. "Yang unik ketika pembentukan itu terjadi bung Karno sedang berada di pengasingan di Bangka, ada Bung Hatta, Laksamana Udara Sudarma," ujar Ade.Ade menjelaskan, kunjungan itupun dinilai menjadi cikal-bakal dimulainya hubungan diplomatik Indonesia-Amerika Serikat 28 Desember 2019, sebab Merle Cochran yang merupakan delegasi KTN pada Desember 1949 menyerahkan surat kepercayaan kepada Bung Karno ketika resmi menjadi Duta Besar Amerika Serikat untuk Indonesia yang pertama. "Waktu itu delegasi dipimpin oleh Merle Cochran, saat itu jabatan resminya apakah ia konsul di Konsul AS di Jakarta. Kelak ia yang menjadi Duta Besar pertama AS," jelas Ade.Untuk dapat menikmati puluhan foto bersejarah itu, Anda dapat berkunjung langsung ke Perpustakan Nasional yang berlokasi di Medan Merdeka Selatan, Jakarta. Di sana Anda akan menemukan langsung berbagai foto bersejarah yang mungkin belum pernah Anda temukan sebelumnya. Seperti, foto yang menunjukkan keakraban presiden Soekarno yang diundang secara informal oleh presiden John. F. Kennedy ke Amerika tepat tiga bulan setelah pelantikan Kennedy sebagai presiden pada tahun 1961.Pada foto tersebut tampak kedua presiden dan seorang pria bercengkrama itu, tampak terlihat hidup. Sebab, warna foto diedit menggunakan teknik pewarnaan sehingga dapat menggambarkan jelas warga pakaian hingga tanaman yang menjadi latarbelakang.

70 Photos of the RI-US Relationship Shown on Display
05 Nov 2019, 16:53 by Retno M



70 Photos of the RI-US Relationship Shown on Display



70 Photos of the RI-US Relationship Shown on Display



70 Photos of the RI-US Relationship Shown on Display


KBRN, Jakarta: Still in the series of 70th celebrations of diplomatic relations between Indonesia and the United States in 2019, this time a photo exhibition was held describing the close relations between the two countries in various sectors. What is unique about the photo exhibition held on November 5 - 10 that at the National Library, is the number of photographs exhibited the same as the age of diplomatic relations between the two countries in 2019 which is as many as 70 pieces. In addition, the 70 photographs are the result of camera shots of reporters between LKBN Antara and Indonesia Press Photo Service (IPPHOS), the United States embassy and the National Library from 1947 to the present. The United States Ambassador to Indonesia, Joseph R. Donovan said, he hoped that through a photo exhibition, the relationship between Indonesia and the United States would be conveyed nicely, which is intertwined in various aspects of life. "I hope from this exhibition shows the relationship between Indonesia and the United States that multifaceted, long-lasting and sustainable and I hope these things can be conveyed from this exhibition, "Donovan said when met on the sidelines of the exhibition, Tuesday (11/05/2019). In particular Donovan conveyed, that the vice president's photo United States, Hubert Humphrey who visited Demak in 1967 became his favorite. "Hmmm, the vice president Humphrey's photo is possible," he added. The reason according to Donovan, the vice president Humphrey's photo was seen trying hard to dig the ground using a hoe. "So my favorite is the vice president Hubert Humphrey's photo when working hard using a hoe," added Donovan. At that time Humphrey visited Demak and met with workers at the Semarang-Demak-Kudus Irrigation Project, which is the "Food for Peace" program and is fully supported by United States government. The photo is a collection of the United States Records and Records Administration Agency. According to the Editor of LKBN Antara, Ade Marboen, a photo of a visit of a number of members of the Three Nations Commission (KTN) in February 1949, to the place of exile of Indonesian officials in Bangka. "What is unique when the formation took place, Bung Karno was in exile in Bangka, there was Bung Hatta, Admiral Sudarma Air," said Ade. Ade explained, the visit was considered to be the embryo of the start of diplomatic relations between Indonesia and the United States on December 28, 2019, because Merle Cochran, who was a delegation of the KTN in December 1949, submitted a letter of trust to Bung Karno when he officially became the first United States Ambassador to Indonesia. "At that time the delegation was led by Merle Cochran, at that time his official position was whether he was consul at the US Consul in Jakarta. Later he was the first US Ambassador," said Ade. To be able to enjoy dozens of historic photos, you can visit directly to the National Library which is located in Medan Merdeka Selatan, Jakarta. There you will find directly various historic photos that you may never find before. Like, a photo that shows the intimacy of President Sukarno who was invited informally by President John. F. Kennedy went to America exactly three months after Kennedy's inauguration as president in 1961. The photos showed the two presidents and a man chatting, looking lively. Because the color of the photo is edited using coloring techniques so that it can clearly illustrate the citizens' clothing to the background plants.
